Thanks folks. I've tried the good old fashioned "Press every key" and managed to get poor old Jeb killed for my troubles . . .

(Falling to the ground from the top of a rocket on the pad is a bad way to go)
Just right click on the ladder and click extend.
Note it might not hilight the ladder when you mouse over it. Even if it's the component you put the ladder on, try right clicking.
